NeatGenomeDecoderFactory

Static factory methods for creating new instances of IGenomeDecoder{TGenome, TPhenome}.

Functions
CreateGenomeDecoder
public static IGenomeDecoder<NeatGenome<double>, IBlackBox<double>> CreateGenomeDecoder(
bool isAcyclic,
bool enableHardwareAcceleration =  false
)

Create a genome decoder that decodes a NeatGenome{T} to an appropriate neural network implementation.

Parameters
isAcyclic
bool

Decode to an acyclic neural network.

enableHardwareAcceleration
bool

Enable use of hardware accelerated black box (i.e neural network) implementations.

Returns

A new instance of IGenomeDecoder{TGenome, TPhenome}.
